name: museum-alert-api
description: AWS CDK-based stack for defining and deploying cloud infrastructure and services meant to complement the 'Museum Alert' IoT project

scripts.rebuild-layer: npm run clean-layer && npm run prepare-layer
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run prepare-layer && AWS_PROFILE=cdk-deploy cdk deploy --all --context stage=dev --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run prepare-layer && npm run build && AWS_PROFILE=cdk-deploy cdk deploy --all --context stage=prod --require-approval never
scripts.diff:dev: npm run prepare-layer && AWS_PROFILE=cdk-deploy cdk diff --all --context stage=dev
scripts.diff:prod: npm run prepare-layer && AWS_PROFILE=cdk-deploy cdk diff --all --context stage=prod
scripts.synth:dev: npm run prepare-layer && AWS_PROFILE=cdk-deploy cdk synth --all --context stage=dev
scripts.synth:prod: npm run prepare-layer && AWS_PROFILE=cdk-deploy cdk synth --all --context stage=prod

author: andrea@humanafragilitas.com
